inclusion.criterion: Resident physicians who have completed at least one month of cardiac rotation are included.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: This high fidelity simulation lab course if offerred to every resident that meets the criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: This is a part of their educational activity.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Resident physicians that did not wish to participate in filling out the survey or not able to fill out the survey.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath. He has COPD and smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
